dc:title: On Pilgrimage - October 1961
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Bits of news of her upcoming speaking engagements and the activities of many workers--answering correspondence, leafleting in Moscow, and on retreat. Reflects on doing "the duties of our state in life" and the need for a sense of Divine Providence.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 786 1961-10-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
